generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, where pedestrians are walking and bicycles are parked.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible on both sides of the street, including multi-story residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street, providing greenery and shade.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible on the sidewalk, including individuals walking and standing.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: A black car is prominently visible in the center of the image, driving on the road.
- truck: A blue truck is visible on the left side of the image, parked or driving on the road.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the image, mounted on a pole.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including directional signs and warning signs, mounted on poles.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and traffic signs.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the sidewalk on the right side of the image, being ridden by a person.
